description.value:
Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Opportune Riposte]{Opportune Riposte} against an enemy who fails at a Strike against you (not just critically fails), provided you have both damaged that creature with a finisher on your last turn and currently have a circumstance bonus to AC from the parry weapon trait, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)]{Dueling Parry}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Twin Parry]{Twin Parry}.
